title: 'Farage plan would split families' and 'Will the King banish Fergie?'
description: Reform's migration plans and the Duchess of York being dropped from charities make Tuesday's front pages.

title: Britain's worst major stations named
description: Figures show around one in 13 scheduled stops at City Thameslink were cancelled over the past year.
content:

title: Davey urges US cancer scientists to come to UK
description: The Lib Dem leader will use his party conference speech to attack Donald Trump's "anti-science agenda".
content:
Davey urges US cancer scientists to come to UK
3 hours ago
Kate WhannelPolitical reporter
The UK government should offer discount visas to US cancer scientists who have had their research cancelled by the Trump administration, Sir Ed Davey will say.

title: London homes 500 metres from station ‘command £42,700 premium over those 1,500 metres away’
description: Nationwide survey in London, Manchester and Glasgow shows pandemic trends may be reversing as more people return to office
content:
People buying homes in London 500 metres from a tube or railway station pay £42,700 more than buyers of similar properties 1,500 metres away from transport hubs, according to new data.
The figures indicate that despite the reshaping of the housing ma... [3126 chars]

title: Reeves urged to take 2p off employee NI and add it to income tax in budget
description: Resolution Foundation says move could raise additional £6bn a year and ‘level the playing field’ on income tax
content:
Rachel Reeves has been urged to take 2p off the rate of employee national insurance and add it to income tax in her autumn budget, to raise billions of pounds while protecting workers’ pay packets.
Putting forward plans to raise up to £30bn, the infl... [3943 chars]
